item.description:
I, Liz F., would like to invite all of you to join me for a party on behalf of the Children?s Community Programs of CT, a non-profit that provides diverse support services to children and families in CT.



It will be held Saturday March 24, 2007 from 8PM to 11PM at the Owl Shop An ad is also featured in this week?s New Haven Advocate.



There will be a $20 donation at the door, $10 for Students. Cash bar with hors d?oeuvres by Soul De Cuba. Music performed by Waterfront Jazz Project.

For the rest of you, your only obligation will be to have a cigar or a drink and relax (since most of my friends smoke and drink heavily in their free time anyways, it really goes without saying).

PS Smoking is legally permitted at Owl Shop in case it is an issue.

Contact Liz F. 203 415.2066
item.name: A Owl Shop Party
